channel.title: CVE Feed for TargetFirst -- Target First Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TargetFirst -- Target First Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-24305|2024-08-03T19:28:23.422Z -- targetfirst -- target%20first%20plugin
item.description: The Target First WordPress Plugin v2.0, also previously known as Watcheezy, suffers from a critical unauthenticated stored XSS vulnerability. An attacker could change the licence key value through a POST on any URL with the 'weeWzKey' parameter that will be save as the 'weeID option and is not sanitized.
